author: Joe
title: Joe
text:
Jorge got back to my quickly, I Quote: d my customer and got the order.
We had called others, but, there response was two to three days out.
Most customers want to get the price and get going, we are under
a time delivery (which shipment has not shipped yet), so we needed
to get item ordered.
Hopefully, I can tell you that they shipped on time, and our customer got
a quality product.
